links.*: The Lord of the Rings Strategy Battle Game

wikitext.*:
'''Citadel Miniatures''' is a company producing miniature figurines for wargaming. Though once a separate company, it now mostly serves as a brand for [[Games Workshop]].

In December [[1984]], Games Workshop announced that it had secured the rights to Lord of the Rings for Citadel, for use with [[Middle-earth Role Playing]].<ref>"Newsboard" in White Dwarf #60, p. 43</ref> It would ultimate lose this license to [[Mithril Miniatures]]. Citadel would later on produce miniatures for [[The Lord of the Rings Strategy Battle Game]] and its successors.
